name: Ships Ahoy! (jonathon.sherwood)
description:
Sail the one sea as you blast away trade ships to gather their loot. But watch out! Naval vessels are constantly on the hunt for pirates like you! Master your skills and earn the highest score!

A passion project to turn a simple idea into a fully fleshed out game. I wanted to make almost everything mine so that I could get a good feel for all parts of development. All art, programming, and design was completed by myself, Jonathon Sherwood, with various sound clips found on Freesound.org (specifics in the credits).
